description: Entering prison is an intimidating experience so this series serves as a guide. Landon Mycles describes the time that he was the fresh meat in prison and shared a cell with tough guy, Sebastian Young. Sebastian shows Landon who is in charge and Landon gives in by dropping right down to suck on his cock, and then take it hard up his ass. Turns out Sebastian is really feeling this newbie and wants his dick deep in his hole, and Landon is in no place to put up a fight.
title: A Guide To Sex In Prison Part 1
